title: Is this good?
body: So I'm downloading LoL right now, the download is at 10% and it's going at 328.5KBps. Is that a good speed?

replies.body:
It's hard to tell whether that's good or bad for your network since I don't know your average speeds outside of LoL, but you might have to try adjusting your DNS settings to see if you can get a little faster speeds at the very least. If you aren't sure how to change your DNS, check out that step in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

It might be worth checking through the other steps as well, or possibly switching to an ethernet cord during that install ^_^!
It depends on your connection. If that doesn't look like a good speed compared to your other downloads, then it probably isn't. Different parts of a download may take longer than others.
I went up 3% in ten minutes

Well, I don't exactly know what your connection is like, or what computer you have, but that does seem kind of slow. Do you have anything running in the background? Do you share your internet with anybody? If so, are they doing anything that could be dragging down your connection? Such as streaming movies, playing heavy online games, etc?
Nope. But, I was stupid enough to give my wifi password to about 10 people.
